resources.string: Emma Nutt is the world\'s first female telephone operator in 19th century. This game was created to admire her life and four other great operators in present day…
Fill in correct operators by tapping \'?\'
A Word from Ms. Emma Nutt:
Your performance doesn\'t deserve my secret.\nTry harder, Grasshopper…
Well done! I will tell you my secret.\nI was paid a salary of $10 per month for a 54 hour week. No kidding!
The smallest natural number and smallest odd number.
The smallest prime number and the only even prime number - \'the oddest prime\'.
When any player in soccer scores 3 goals in one game, it\'s called a hat-trick.
\'Fantastic 4\' is Marvel Comic\'s superhero team.\nThe Beatles were called \'Fab 4\'.
All major north-south Interstate Highways in the United States end in 5.
Insects have 6 legs. Hence spiders are not insects.
The sum of the squares of the first 7 prime numbers is 666.
